newsitem.title: INDIA: Separatists kill four Indian security men.
newsitem.headline: Separatists kill four Indian security men.

text.p: Separatist guerillas killed at least four Indian security personnel and injured four others in the north eastern state of Assam on Wednesday, police said.
They said the guerrillas, armed with sophisticated arms, attacked the vehicles of the security personnel at Samuguri in the central district of Nagaon while they were heading for a combing operation.
The separatists, who are seeking an autonomous Assamese homeland, accuse India's federal government of exploiting the state's rich mineral and timber resources and giving little in return.
Indian officials have said they believe the movement has been largely contained.
